title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. XI, pt. 501 - Public Access To Records
content:

N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. XI, pt. 501

Statutory authority: Public Authorities Law, §§ 1852[3], 1855[4]; Public Officers Law, §
87[1]; State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
